{"currentConversationId":"__NEW_AGENT__","conversations":{"__NEW_AGENT__":{"id":"__NEW_AGENT__","createdAtIso":"2025-07-18T07:27:24.615Z","lastInteractedAtIso":"2025-07-18T07:27:24.651Z","chatHistory":[],"feedbackStates":{},"toolUseStates":{},"draftExchange":{"request_message":"I want to create the layout/UI design for section 5.9 "Upload Song Screen / Edit Song Screen" from the SRS document. Please analyze the requirements in the SRS.md file for this screen, then create the corresponding Android layout XML files and any necessary UI components. The layout should include:

1. Form fields for song metadata (title, artist, album, genre, etc.)
2. File upload/selection functionality for audio files
3. Image upload for album artwork
4. Save/Update and Cancel buttons
5. Proper validation and user feedback elements
6. Responsive design that follows Android Material Design guidelines

Please examine the SRS document first to understand the specific requirements for this screen, then implement the layout files in the appropriate Android project structure.","rich_text_json_repr":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"I want to create the layout/UI design for section 5.9 "Upload Song Screen / Edit Song Screen" from the SRS document. Please analyze the requirements in the SRS.md file for this screen, then create the corresponding Android layout XML files and any necessary UI components.
